content: भ्रांतिः [भ्रम्-क्तिन्] {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Moving or wandering about. {@--2@} Turning round, rolling. {@--3@} A revolution, circular or rotatory movement; चक्रभ्रांतिररांतरेषु वितनोत्यन्यामिवारावलीं <ls>V. 1. 4.</ls> {@--4@} An error, a mistake, delusion, wrong notion, false idea or impression; श्रितासि चंदनभ्रांत्या दुर्विपाकं विषद्रुमं <ls>U. 1. 47.</ls> {@--5@} Confusion, perplexity. {@--6@} Doubt, uncertainty, suspense. {@--7@} Unsteadiness.
